Plot: Empowered by the love of a slave (Jang), a royal concubine (Cheung) is given the chance to make an extraordinary decision.
Title: The Promise
Actors: Dong-gun Jang, Hiroyuki Sanada, Cecilia Cheung, Nicholas Tse
tomatoConsensus: An incoherent plot and ridiculously obvious CGI effects doom this effort from the usually outstanding Chinese director Chen Kaige.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
